DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Your next card that Fires! is played X times.
You must have thehighwayman:Ammo to play this card. Lose all thehighwayman:Ammo when played.
When attacked, deal 7 damage to the attacker (modified like an attack).
If X has increased since target's last turn, target loses X HP at the start of its turn. Otherwise, target loses X stacks of Bleed.
If an unblocked attack deals X damage or less, prevent it and reduce this by 1
Put the card from the bottom of your deck into your hand.
Put a card from your discard onto the bottom of your draw pile.
If you have no ammo, gain 1. Otherwise, gain the effect specified.
